faqs.question: Why can't I present skin to my friend？

2019-06-06 13:23:43  

If you want to present skin to your friends，you need to meet the following conditions.

1. You must be friends for at least 7days.

2. Lv 20 and above players can send skins as gifts to each other. There are two things you need to pay attention to.

2. Skins already owned will turn into Rare Skin Fragments.

faqs.question: Why am I always matched with weaker players?
faqs.content:
Why am I always matched with weaker players?

2017-09-05 05:31:22  

In the match up mode the system matches players according to their ELO score, while in the ranked game, the rank tier is also considered. As a team game, everyone’s performance could be vital to the battle, including your enemy team’s performance. Players may not perform perfectly sometimes, and that's normal. 

As you improve your own rank, certainly you will meet more skilled players and enemies in higher ranked games.

Also you can team up with your friends to fight with strategies and win together.

faqs.question: Live stream feature Introduction
faqs.content:
Live stream feature Introduction

2019-06-06 14:31:45  

In-game live stream feature is available now. Its functions include:

a. Streamer feature:

A Streamer Info card has been added to the player basic info board. Players above Master division can apply for being a game streamer to become a superstar!

Streamers can turn on the in-game live stream feature, and then your matches can be watched by other players and you can receive gifts from viewers to get lots of diamond rewards.

b. Follow feature:

There will be a list of your 'following' and a list of your 'follows'. Players can follow streamers in-game and then they will show up in your 'following' list. At the same time, you will show up in the streamer's 'follows' list.

c. Broadcasting feature:

When streamer players turn on the live stream feature, they can broadcast their games live. Those who have high popularity will be recommended by the system and show up in the Game live stream list and become superstars.

If you want to appear in the live stream list, do your best to improve your popularity! More follows or more gifts that you can get will increase your popularity.

d. Global leaderboard:

There will a Streamer Popularity Leaderboard and a Fans Leaderboard. Let's see who can be the biggest superstar in the world!

Worldwide live stream tendency, come and take part in now! Will the next most popular streamer of Mobile Legends: Bang Bang be you?

faqs.question: How to start an external stream?
faqs.content:
How to start an external stream?

2019-06-06 14:34:12  

The Android version of Mobile Legends: Bang Bang now can stream toYoutube and Facebook. You do not need any extra third-party tools to startstreaming to Facebook or Facebook on Android. Android users require OS version5.0 or newer, iOS users need IOS 10.0 or newer, iOS users will require you tohave replay kit supporting third-party software to stream.

1. Tap on the main page’s Live button on the sidebar

2. After entering, then tap the [Start Stream] button on the right side.

2.1 If Android players are streaming on YouTube, you need to have yourown Youtube channel, while also have the live streaming feature open onYoutube, please change it beforehand at https://www.youtube.com/live_dashboard

You may watch our Official English Streaming Tutorial

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3bwEgHJbDnk&t=24s

If you haveto stream on Facebook, then please change to Facebook at the top.

2.2 iOS players, please open [Stream Settings], a Stream button willappear, tapping on it will open your already installed streaming app, streamingwill then start. If you do not have such an app, please go to the App Store andinstall a replaykit supporting software and set it up.

3. In the settings interface, you can write an eye-catching title, if youwant to show off your super good looks or beautiful voice you may also tryopening up the webcam and microphone. After opening the microphone and webcam, you may get a notificationsaying that MLBB requires the rights to access your microphone and webcam,please allow this. You may also select the quality of your stream at thebottom, the higher the quality, the resource it will use and better the connectionit’ll require.

4. Tap[Start] to start your live streaming with your YouTube or Facebook account.

We will continuously improve the Live system andyou are welcome to give us your feedback.

Finally, to encourage all players creatingbetter Live Stream, we are planning to have a series of streaming event in ourforum.

faqs.question: How do I level up my character? What gains do I get after leveling up?
faqs.content:
How do I level up my character? What gains do I get after leveling up?

2017-12-06 03:59:52  

Outside Battlefield Account Level: Players can get Exp to level up their account level via completing match up battles and daily tasks. Post-level up effects will be rolled out in the future. 

The highest level is Lv.30. When your account reaches Lv.30, your account cannot level up anymore.

Inside Battlefield Hero Level: Only used in the current battle. Kill minions, jungle monsters, heroes, and destroy towers to get Hero Exp. As heroes level up, they will get more stats and skill points.

faqs.question: What do defense turrets do?
faqs.content:
What do defense turrets do?

2017-12-06 06:11:07  

The three lanes between the opposing sides bases all have 3 defense towers: Outer Turrets, Inner Turrets, and Inhibitor Turrets. The outer turrets must be destroyed first before inner turrets can be attacked. After destroying all 3 of an enemy's turrets on one lane, you can attack the enemy's base.
Your whole team will get a certain amount of gold each time you destroy an enemy defense turret.

faqs.question: How do I start a battle?
faqs.content:
How do I start a battle?

2017-12-06 06:16:50  

Upon starting the game the first time, there will be a new-player tutorial that will show you how to get matched up for a battle. The basic steps are:
1. Tap the red button in the middle of the main screen to start the match-up process.
2. Wait patiently for both teams to fill up with 5 players.
3. Tap to enter game.
4. Choose the champion you wish to use.
5. Tap to start, and when the countdown ends, the battle will begin!

faqs.question: What types of heroes are there? What are their characteristics?
faqs.content:
What types of heroes are there? What are their characteristics?

2019-06-06 14:19:54  

Heroes are divided into Warrior, Assassin, Marksman, Tank, Mage, and Support. Only the first 5 of these types appear in the current version.
Warrior: Usually have decent durability and attacks and are fairly easy to operate. Good for beginners.
Assassin: Usually have a strong dash and attacking capabilities. They might not have a lot of HP, but they can use skills to make escapes. Harder than average to operate.
Marksman: Long ranged attacks with high DPS capability. Average durability and fairly easy to operate.
Tank: High armor and HP make them very durable. They usually possess good initiating and disabling abilities, making them good at starting team fights. Fairly easy to operate.
Mage: Long range attacks, disables, and usually decent burst damage. They will be on the squishy side, and relatively tough to operate.

faqs.question: Starlight Member Privileges
faqs.content:
Starlight Member Privileges

2019-06-03 10:19:34  

1. Purchase Starlight Members and obtain the Exclusive Permanent skin of this month right away. Also, the premium prize pool will be unlocked. Starlight Member Trial does NOT grant Starlight Skin nor unlock premium prize pool.

2. The premium prize pool and Starlight skin refresh at 0:00, 1st of each month (Server Time).

3. When you have purchased Starlight Members, you will get 31 days of Starlight membership privileges. Check the “Privileges” page for details.

4. When you have purchased Starlight Member or you get the privileges of Starlight Member, you can claim weekly rewards on the “Privileges” page right away. The unclaimed rewards will be sent to you by email.

5. When you have purchased Starlight Member, the exclusive Avatar Border will be unlocked for you. Check it on the Profile Page.

6. Each player obtains VIP Scores by logging in every day/spend Diamonds/partake in matches, which can be used to upgrade VIP level. An ordinary player can claim rewards in the Free prize pool while Starlight Members can claim rewards both in Free prize pool and Premium Pool. The rewards refresh at 0:00, 1st of each month (Server Time).

7. The Starlight Member is required to exchange in the Starlight Shop. Also, you can exchange for rewards only when your VIP level is MAX. Then you can use VIP Scores or VIP Gems to exchange.

8. Purchase Starlight Member Plus and unlock premium prize pool for 1 time and obtain 2000 VIP Scores right away. Meanwhile, the Starlight Skin of this month and Starlight Privileges that last for 31 days will be unlocked.

9. Purchase Starlight Member Quarter Card is equivalent to purchase or renew the Starlight Member's monthly card 3 times.

faqs.question: How to retrieve lost account
faqs.content:
How to retrieve lost account

2019-03-30 02:33:23  

A. Accounts that have been bound with social platforms

If your lost account has already been bound with a social account (Google , Facebook ,VK or Game Center) but don’t know how to log in, please follow the illustration below : click avatar -- account -- Log to the existing account to login your old account

B. accounts across advanced server and normal server

If you switch to a new account when changing server between advanced server and normal server, don’t worry. tap the server list, select the server where you were, and tap enter game to log in to your lost role.


C. Accounts hacked

Firstly, if you have bound game with social platforms and protect your platform accounts well. Your game accounts can not be easily hacked.

Don’t believe in any non-official transaction. And don’t participate in any accounts deals.

if your account was hacked, please send email to MobileLegendsGame@gmail.com and provide the information we need in the mail.

In case the hacker can see any chat from inside the game and steal your info.

email us and we will help you.

The information needed is the same as in-game account forms.

You can also refer to next part.

D. Normal account lost without having been bound to any social platform:

Please fill in the account from in-game form:

(Tap customer service-account problem-account lostto find the form to be filled.)

Next is how to fill the form:

The 【Nickname】 of the lost account: input the accurate nickname

The 【Server】 of the lost account: You can find the information about the ID and server from the basic information page: tap add friend-input the nick name of your lost account - Name Search - View, then you will find the server number.

The 【ID number】 of the lost account: we suggest you save a screenshot of your account basic information page (open your avatar you will see the ID and server under nick name), if you don't remember the ID number , it would help you.

The 【Device model】 of the lost account: if you changed your device, please input the device model of the lost account, such as Samsung I9500, you can find it in your device options.

【Registration date】 of the lost account: please remember the approximate date you created your lost account, you can check when you install MLBB at google play store or App store, the first achievement you got in game center or google play, then infer an approximate date.

【Last login time】 of the lost account: not necessary

【Payment order number】:

If you used to purchase packages, please provide the recent and earlier recharge records (Date, amount and order number):

Android Device: go to your Gmail address and check the payment confirmation mail that google sent to you.

（And here is the Google Store Help if you delete that mail.

https://support.google.com/store/answer/6160235?hl=en）

provide the GPA number like GPA.****-****-****-*****.

Order screenshot (Android device):

IOS Device: provide the screenshots of your order receipt. you can find them in your E-mail and iTunes.

The Level of Character: please input the accurate level, so we can locate your account.

The number of hero and hero' s name: not necessary

The number of Skin and skin's name: not necessary

Please provide the NEW account or current using account 【ID number】 and 【Server】: we will transfer the social account bound with your new game account to your lost account, so it’s very important.

If you are using the new account, please bind a social platform account to your current account.

Please ensure that the new account has been bound with a social account:This operation is in order to restore your lost account, it is necessary.

The reason about the lost account: change device, hacked or other reasons, it’s important.

faqs.question: Don't share your account information!
faqs.content:
Don't share your account information!

2018-02-08 05:46:50  

Do not take your account security lightly and avoid getting ripped off or illegally taken advantage of by others.
For an account to get stolen, first someone must have gotten hold of your account info, so please remember to keep your account info safe.
Please keep in mind the following 3 basic rules to protect your account:
1. Never reveal your Game Center or Google Play account or password to anyone-- including us! Youngjoy employees will never under any circumstances ask you to provide these accounts or passwords.
2. Avoid logging into your account on other people's devices. If you truly must, then by all means remember to log out of your account afterwards!
3. The only approved method of making in-app purchases is by using your own account from within the in-game store. There may be some unapproved 3rd party sites that offer in-game currency at a discount, but these sites often stolen credit card information and accounts to make transactions, and using these methods increases the risk of getting your account stolen.

For Apple

faqs.question: How do I avoid accidental purchases?
faqs.content:
How do I avoid accidental purchases?

2018-05-28 03:51:48  

In order to avoid accidental in-app purchases, you will need to adjust your Google Play Store settings.

Please follow these steps:

1. Access the Google Play Store.  

2. Enter the 'Settings' menu.   

3. Look for 'User Controls' and activate 'Use password to restrict purchases'  

4. Enter your password and tap confirm when finished.    

5. Any subsequent in-game purchase after changing your settings will require your security password. 

Remember: after entering your password once, you can make purchases on Google Play for 30 minutes without entering it again. If your device is running Android OS 4.2 or higher and someone else regularly uses it, you might (depending on your device) be able to create a separate User profile for them by going to Settings > Users > Add user, then following the on-screen instructions.

faqs.question: Add, Remove, Switch or edit a payment method
faqs.content:
Add, Remove, Switch or edit a payment method

2018-05-23 02:59:29  

To purchase in-app content you first need to add a valid payment method to your Google Account. You can add several payment methods (Card, DCB, Paypal) to one Google account. 

Add a payment method
  1. Open the Google Play Store app 
  2. Touch Menu > Account > Add payment method
  3. Follow the onscreen instructions
  4. The new payment method will be added to your Google account

For more information about available payment options go see this

 Help Center article. Remove a payment method
  1. Open the Google Play Store app 
  2. Touch Menu  > Account
  3. Under Payment methods, touch More payment settings
  4. If prompted, sign in to payments.google.com
  5. Touch the payment method you want to remove
  6. Touch Remove > Yes, remove it

The payment method will be removed from your Google account. 

Edit a payment method
  1. Open the Google Play Store app 
  2. Touch Menu  > Account
  3. Under Payment methods, touch 'More payment settings'
  4. Sign in to your payments.google.com account
  5. Touch the payment method you want to edit
  6. Touch 'Edit'
  7. Make your updates and tap 'Save'
Change your payment method while making a purchase
  1. Open the game 
  2. Go to the shop
  3. Touch the package you want to purchase
  4. Tap on 'Payment methods'
  5. Choose from one of your existing payment methods or add a new one
  6. Complete your purchase

Note: if you add a payment method while making a purchase, it will be saved in your account.

faqs.question: My purchase was canceled!
faqs.content:
My purchase was canceled!

2017-12-15 08:18:19  

If you've tried making a purchase but your order was canceled, you will not be charged for that order.

However, Google Play may put a temporary “reservation” on your credit card equal to the value of the purchase. But don't sweat it; these “reservations” clear automatically in a short period of time.

Canceled purchases are likely to occur if your billing address, and/or the name registered in your Google Wallet is different than the one on your credit card. Straighten this out by contacting your bank to confirm details, then log into your Google Payments (at payments.google.com), and enter “Payment Methods” to verify that your information is consistent.

faqs.question: All the Diamonds from my order have been removed！
faqs.content:
All the Diamonds from my order have been removed！

2019-06-06 13:15:25  

As a rule, in-app purchases are non-refundable, and certain conditions apply to any exceptions we make. Moonton wants to keep a fair playing field, and reserves the right to revoke access to any refunded content. This means that if the money used for an order of 1,000 Diamonds is refunded, we may remove that amount of Diamonds from your account. If any of those resources have been spent prior to the refund, it can result in a negative Diamond balance in your game. And we will freeze all bought heroes which means you will not be able to use them nor play Ranked matches until you recharge your diamond balance to a positive number.

Following refunds comprising multiple, large orders, it may even be necessary for us to suspend access to a game account. This is also the case if a player has made Diamond orders using a third-party Diamond seller in breach of Moonton's Terms of Service. We understand -- no player wants to find their Diamond coffers empty. Even then, removing refunded Diamonds is the only way we can reconcile the gap between a player's payments and Diamond balance. When you order Diamonds, it goes without saying that they are yours to keep. When payment for an order is canceled, the opposite is true, just like in any transaction: you forfeit your claim to the refunded item. As an online game, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang’s economy and mechanics are always the same for every player. The same applies to Diamond access. To avoid an unpleasant surprise, remember to keep your mobile device safe and locked, and never, ever share your game account with anyone.

faqs.question: Can I buy diamonds outside the game through third-party websites?
faqs.content:
Can I buy diamonds outside the game through third-party websites?

2019-06-06 12:43:14  

Short answer: nope!

The only way to purchase diamonds is through the in-game shop (processed securely by the iTunes or Google).

There are many third-party websites offering in-game currency for Mobile Legends:Bang Bang, but NONE of them are safe to use. Ignore whatever their websites claim, they are NOT sponsored by Moonton. Often, third parties will ask for Game Center/Google login credentials. This will give them access to your game. If you give them those credentials, we cannot guarantee your account's security.

If you purchased diamonds from somewhere other than the game, we unfortunately cannot assist you any further, as your account has already breached our Terms of Service.

We reserve the right to ban game accounts with Gem orders from third-party websites.

faqs.question: I spent my Diamonds,tickets or BP by accident! Can I get them back?
faqs.content:
I spent my Diamonds,tickets or BP by accident! Can I get them back?

2018-01-11 09:07:19  

By adding intuitive confirmation steps, we’ve done everything we can to limit accidental purchases from the game. When making a purchase with Diamonds,tickets or BP, you will always be notified, and asked to proceed before spending any actual Diamonds,tickets or BP. This has done very well in limiting such instances. 

Because Mobile Legends:Bang Bang is a live, online multiplayer game, reversing changes would have adverse effects on other players you've interacted with. As we can’t turn back anyone's in-game progress, or remove features, providing this refund would put you in a privileged position, which we see as unfair to other players who earned the same item or upgrade through their own Diamonds,tickets or BP or gameplay.

faqs.question: Why have my Diamonds,tickets or BP disappeared?
faqs.content:
Why have my Diamonds,tickets or BP disappeared?

2018-01-08 08:43:28  

If you’ve opened your game to find that Diamonds,tickets or BP have gone missing, it’s because they’ve somehow been spent. Usually, this is just due to the curiosity of a friend or family member. It's also likely if you’ve loaded your account onto someone else’s device, and didn’t sign off. They could be using it without you knowing. 

The game cannot use Diamonds,tickets or BP on its own, purchases must be requested by the user. Accidental purchases are a possibility, though we’ve added a series of intuitive confirmation steps to prevent this. 

In order to prevent these instances from happening in the future, please remember to lock your screen after playing. If you’ve loaded your account onto someone else’s device, remember to log out when you’re done.

faqs.question: I have not received an item that I bought. What should I do?
faqs.content:
I have not received an item that I bought. What should I do?

2019-06-03 09:18:22  

When a purchase goes through, you will receive a purchase successful notice. If you have not received this notice, maybe your purchase has failed due to a connection issue.

Sometimes, the servers are busy, and your purchase icon is grayed out. If the purchase icon in your game is gray, you should:

- Examine if you are logged into a payment account - Wait and try again later; the server may be too busy to handle your purchase order

- Update your game to the newest version - If the problem persists, please examine your payment account, whether you have set a valid payment method.

- If you are using a credit card, examine whether your card has restrictions on application payments or online payments.

- If the purchase amount was deducted from your method of payment, but you still can't get them after 12 hours, please contact us and send us the payment order number that google or itunes sent you(check your mail). It should resemble GPA.XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXX we will check it and send you the package once we have verified it.

faqs.question: Why do I get a "high risk" warning?
faqs.content:
Why do I get a "high risk" warning?

2019-06-06 12:52:12  

For user security reasons, the Google Play Store may deem certain purchases out of the ordinary. This automatically prevents unwanted charges on your device. Purely by accident, the system has determined that your purchase was “high-risk”, canceling it in the process.

Don’t worry; the reservation will clear automatically. However, you’ll be unable to make further purchases for 30 minutes (sometimes longer).

In the meantime, verify that your name and billing address are exactly as listed on your credit card.

If you continue receiving the “high-risk” pop-up, please refer to this link.

faqs.question: Why are my diamonds negative? My heroes are frozen can't join Ranked match!
faqs.content:
Why are my diamonds negative? My heroes are frozen can't join Ranked match!

2019-06-06 13:18:18  

A negative diamond balance indicates account misuse. Once your diamonds are negative, we will freeze all bought heroes which means you will not be able to use them nor play Ranked matches until you recharge your diamond balance to a positive number. There are some possibility

First: We will deduct the equivalent diamond if any player is found to have acquired a large number of game items through a bug.

Second: A negative diamond balance happens when you refund a diamond order after the diamonds have already been used.

There is another possibility that your payment didn't go through and an automatic refund may have happened

For refund issues related to Google or Apple, please contact their respective support services.

For Apple (iOS) devices:

Visit Apple support and select the 'Contact iTunes store support' link, then 'Purchases, billing and redemption' and choose the option that fits you best.

For Google (Android) devices:

Visit Google support and perform a search, or use the ‘Contact us’ button on the page (English language site only) to reach a Google customer support representative by email or by phone.

faqs.question: My sound effects are gone!
faqs.content:
My sound effects are gone!

2019-06-06 13:57:47  

If your game has gone silent, there are plenty of potential fixes.

Start by checking the in-game settings. Are your sound effects set to “on?” They should be.

If your settings are in order, but your game’s still muted, restart by fully exiting the app, and reopening it.

If neither of these help, please try the following:

· Important: make sure the mute switch is set to OFF

· Try plugging in, and unplugging some earphones

· Open another app, and check if sound is working there. If not, then it probably has something to do with the device, and not the app itself

If none of these seem to work, please feel free to submit a support ticket

faqs.question: Guide for Speed Mode
faqs.content:
Guide for Speed Mode

2019-06-06 13:50:55  

Mobile Legends: Bang Bang team has kept improving the solutions for the connection problems. Now you have two options for connection:

Normal Mode(Default):

Consume less data usage but the network connection is not as stable as Speed Mode.

Speed Mode:

Make network connection more stable, prevent lag spikes but cost more data usage.

How to turn on/off the Speed ModeIn the home screen:

Open 'Settings' on the top right, turn on/off 'Speed Mode' in 'Basics' - 'Network Setting'.

In matches:

Open 'Settings' on the top left, turn on/off 'Speed Mode' in 'Basics' - 'Network Setting'.

Speed Mode takes in effect immediately the moment you turn it on and will keep in effect until you switch it off manually.

When should I turn on the Speed Mode?

If you often meet lag spikes or lags under green ping. we suggest you turn on the Speed Mode.

Can I keep playing under the Normal Mode?

Of course. If you play smoothly under the Normal Mode, you'd better keep using it because it will save a lot of data usage.

When should I turn off the Speed Mode?

Some network operators don't support Speed Mode. If you meet heavy lags under the Speed Mode, we suggest you turn off the Speed Mode because in that situation the Normal Mode is better.

The Mobile Legends: Bang Bang team keeps improving the Speed Mode. If it makes your connection better, please tell us that will make the developers more confident. If it doesn't work or make your connection worse, we need your suggestion, too. Thanks for your understanding and support!

faqs.question: Why is the game so laggy? How can I fix it?
faqs.content:
Why is the game so laggy? How can I fix it?

2019-06-06 13:54:29  

1. Check the ping in the top right of the screen. If the ping is above 100, then try playing somewhere with a strong network connection.

2. Check if your device meets the following requirements: Android 4.0+, 1G RAM+,

4. Core CPU. If your device doesn't meet these requirements, we recommend switching to a device that does.

3. We recommend closing any other apps that might be using up your RAM and turn down in-game animation/special effect settings.
4. If this still doesn't solve the problem, please get help from customer service via the in-game 'Contact Us' link on the game's main page.

faqs.question: Why received a notice about punishment?
faqs.content:
Why received a notice about punishment?

2019-06-06 14:06:33  

Dear player，

If you do something described below，You will get a punishment.

1.If you are put in the auto-fight mode for a long time.

2.If you are matched up and do not press Okay.

3.If another player reports you and the report is validated.

If you meet any problem, please contact us again. Thank you for your support and cooperation! I wish you a pleasant game!

faqs.question: No Account trade !
faqs.content:
No Account trade !

2018-06-11 01:59:12  

Account sales involve advertising advanced game accounts, and luring players eager to progress with tantalizing and unrealistic promises.

Selling, buying, sharing or giving game accounts to other players is against our terms of service and never endorsed by Moonton. 

The risks surrounding account sales are:

  • The seller may take your money and never give you the account
  • You cannot be sure that the seller won't continue using the account
  • They may be selling the same account to multiple people
  • The account status is unknown; it could already be poised for permanent ban
  • The account will never be secure; Moonton cannot provide support for compromised accounts
  • If you choose to spend money on the account, it is still in danger of permanent closure due to breach of our ToS

Help stop this nasty practice by refusing to sell your account, and reporting those who do!

Consequences of misconduct: 

We cannot guarantee the security of any account that has been passed from one player to another; we reserve the right to permanently ban any account that has been transferred between players.

faqs.question: Don't be a Cheat!
faqs.content:
Don't be a Cheat!

2019-06-06 14:05:08  

We consider “bot” and “mod” use cheating, and strongly encourage players to remove any of the aforementioned programs from their devices.

Third party software consists of unapproved apps that manipulate gameplay. By altering game functionality, third-party software aims to provide unfair advantages while putting your account and privacy at risk.

Third-party software includes:

  • Hacks, 'mods', or programs that unfairly alter game functionality
  • 'Bots', or gameplay automation services or scripts
  • Any other programs that aim to modify or provide unearned progress

Consequences of misconduct:

Trying to gain an unfair advantage by using prohibited 3rd party software will result in a permanent ban for any offending account(s).

faqs.question: Legend with Respect!
faqs.content:
Legend with Respect!

2019-06-06 14:03:19  

We're all here to enjoy games together. Sometimes that can mean arguing with friends over lost battles. That's fine, but being abusive towards others drains the fun from the game.

When engaging in any kind of in-game communication, we kindly ask that you are respectful of others. This also applies to the language used in your nickname, squad's name and description.

Here are a few things that we consider inappropriate:

  • Hate speech, racism and other discriminatory languages
  • Obscene or sexually explicit banter
  • Threats or harassment
  • Excessive swearing
  • Bullying

If you encounter another player being abusive towards yourself or others, please let us know by using the

report button inside the chat

. Reports are reviewed by our trained moderators who will take appropriate action.

Consequences of misconduct:

Abusive behavior can lead to temporary and even permanent game account closure. Making false reports can lead to the same.

faqs.question: Notice About Account Security
faqs.content:
Notice About Account Security

2018-06-14 08:22:58  

In order to protect the benefits and account security of the Mobile Legends: Bang Bang players, to maintain a fair and orderly environment and to prevent account hacking/loss that results from account sharing, account trading etc. Please read the following notice to enhance your awareness of account security:

Ⅰ Notice

1.       Please protect your account and keep it safe. Do not share your account password with others or in public. The official team never asks for your password.

2.       Do not sell your account. We will not deal with the problem results from account trading, or you will be solely responsible for any subsequent consequences that may arise.

3.       Do not click unknown links or the links provided by other players (fake official staff) for recharge giveaway, free account, free skins etc.

4.       Do not recharge via unofficial channels or third parties. Unofficial channels usually steal your account information that may compromise your account.

5.       Please be noticed that official staff doesn't show in the game. The so-called official staff or GMs in the game are fake. Please report when you meet them.

6.       When you see an event in community/social media, please be careful to identify the official account/page. You can check the official account/page in Community(globe icon) on the left side of the home screen in the game.

 

Ⅱ About Account Recovery

1.       If the social media account that you bound to is hacked, please appeal and change your password as soon as possible.

2.       Please send an e-mail to the official GM with the title of “account hacked” and account ID at mobilelegendsgame@gmail.com once your account is hacked. If you just contact GM in the game, the hacker may see the chat and other important information to retrieve your account.

3.       After we receive your e-mail, GM will contact you with a link. Please open the link in your browser. You have to provide correct and complete information in the form. If there is any missing or incorrect information, we will not be able to deal with it.

4.       Please keep your account safe. We will only handle the account hacking problem once every 180 days. Please be noticed that we can't help you if the account is hacked again during the time.

5.       Following situations are not considered Hacked:

A: Already sent account to a friend. Due to personal issues, friend doesn’t give the account back etc. We will not deal with it.

B: Account was shared. We can’t judge the account was hacked or not.

 

Additionally, if you haven’t bound your account, there is a risk of account loss. Please tap your avatar – Account – Bind Account to keep your account safe.

 

Thanks for your understanding and support. Let’s keep Mobile Legends: Bang Bang in a safe and harmonious environment.

faqs.question: How to report feed,afk , insulting and cheating players during the battle
faqs.content:
How to report feed,afk , insulting and cheating players during the battle

2017-08-23 05:21:01  

Dear player

Thx for your feedback and support.

You can report AFK or insulting players,feeders and cheaters  you met during the battle in game.

  PAY ATTENTION THAT we cannot deal with these players if you didn't report them in game before.

Then system will automatically determine his behavior and send you a mail about it at once.

You can check it for more details.

Normally if one player afk,he will lose 'honor points'.After afk two or more battle he will not be able to join rank mode

He need to finish serveral normal battle(without any bad behaviors) to earn back enough points.Then he can play again.

Feeder and insulting behavior are same,cheater we will ban them account .

All these methods are made by system,so players need to report them in game first.

BTW:How to report players

In the battle result table page(when battle is over), tap the red exclamation mark in the top right corner.

Then tap the exclamation mark button next to the corresponding players, select the report reason and submit.

We are always trying our best to maintain a healthy gaming environment and a fair gameplay. 

Last but not least,have a nice day.:)

faqs.question: Privacy Policy
faqs.content:
Privacy Policy

2018-05-24 11:53:47  

Updated Privacy Policy

We’ve recently updated our Privacy Policy. If you signed up of an account prior to May 25th, 2018, we’ll ask you to agree to the new Privacy Policy when you use Mobile Legends: Bang bang or application (which we here collectively call the Service) on or after May 25th, 2018. The updated Privacy Policy will automatically come into effect for all existing users on May 25th, 2018. Your continued use of the Service from that day on will be subject to the new Privacy Policy. Please read the Privacy Policy carefully. If you signed up for an account on or after May 25th, 2018, the updated Privacy Policy apply to you.

[Privacy Policy] Mobile Legends: Bang bang

Effective Date: May 25th, 2018

Thank you for playing our game Mobile Legends: Bang bang!

 

When this policy mentions “Moonton”, “We”, “us” or “our”, it refers to Shanghai Moonton Technology Co., Ltd. that is responsible for your information under this Privacy Policy (the “Data Controller”).

 

When we reference “Service” or “Moonton’s Service”, we mean Mobile Legends: Bang bang and any other Moonton’s games, applications.

 

Shanghai Moonton Technology Co., Ltd. (Moonton) see it as our responsibility to set examples and help establish the standards for privacy on the Internet. During registration, each service asks the user to provide different types and amounts of personal information. Moonton intends through the use of such information in good faith to deliver better services.

 

Moonton is dedicated to protecting the privacy rights of its online users (users or user). This Online Privacy Policy (Privacy Policy) has been crafted to inform users as to  the ways Moonton collects, stores, uses, and manages the information users provide during the use of any Moonton game or application (Service).

 

By using the service, users are agreeing to the collection and use of their personal information as outlined in this privacy policy. Moonton may amend the privacy policy from time to time, and Moonton encourages users to consult the privacy policy regularly for changes.

 

TABLE OF CONTENTS

•    How We Collect Information

•    How We Use and Share Information

•    Your Rights and Options

•    How We Protect Personal Information

•    Children’s Privacy

•    Links to Other Websites, Games or Applications

•    Updates to Our Privacy Policy

•    How to Contact Us

•    Copyright Policy

 

1. How We Collect Information

We generally collect or receive information in three ways: (1) you directly provide information to us, such as by creating an account, making purchases, or signing up for email alerts, (2) we collect information automatically, such as through cookies or through use of other software, and (3) we collect information from third party, such as social networks, may provide information to us. Each of these methods is described in more detail below.

 

1.1  Information You Provide to Us

You may provide your information to us when you choose to use Moonton’s Service. Because we change our offerings and features from time to time, the options you have to provide us with information also may change. The information we collect from you will vary depending on the services you are using. In general, we collect information you providing us, including:

 

•    Account Information: When you sign up for an Moonton Account, we require certain information such as username, password, email address;

•    Demographic Details: for instance in response to surveys about Moonton’s Service, such as your gender, country; Payment Information: If you choose to make a purchase, we will collect payment-related information such as your name, address, telephone number, payment card number, and payment account details;

•    Profile Information: such as profile photo;

•    Information about your use of the Service, such as gameplay data, controller button inputs, your interactions with other players and statistics inside Moonton’s Service.

 

1.2  Information We Collect Automatically

We collect information automatically through technologies such as web browsers, cookies, log files, web beacons, and our back-end servers collect usage data transmitted from our games and other software. We use the information for purposes such as modifying or improving features, managing advertising, addressing technical issues, preventing fraud, and conducting data analytics. The type of information that we automatically collect may vary, but generally includes:

 

•    Your IP address and mobile device identifiers (such as your device ID, IDFA, MAC address, SSAID);

•    Information we collect with cookies and similar technologies (see more below);

•    Information about your device, media, hardware and software you use to access the Internet or Moonton’s Service, such as device name and operating system, browser type and language you prefer;

•    Crash reports, which may be automatically generated when a game or application crashes and includes information about your system and the crash;

•    Transaction Information: If you choose to make a purchase, we will collect transaction-related information such as number of transaction, object of transaction, virtual currency etc.;

 

1.3 Information Provided to Us by Third Party

The information that a user shares with Moonton is collected, stored, and handled carefully by Moonton. However, we may share such information during co-operation with third parties to offer some of its services in conjunction with such third parties.  Moonton will urge such third parties to handle the said information in compliance with this privacy policy. Through good co-operation or even alliance with other reputable organizations of goodwill, we have been dedicated to providing the best internet service to its users. Information provided to us by third party includes:

 

•    Third Party Services. If you link, connect, or login to your Moonton Account with a third party service (e.g. Facebook, Game Center, Vkontakte <“VK”>), the third party service may send us information such as your registration and profile information from that service. This information varies and is controlled by that service or as authorized by you via your privacy settings at that service.

•    We may also receive information about you when other players choose to share their contact lists with us.

 

2. How We Use and Share Information

2.1  Using Your Information

We use, store, and process your personally identifiable and non-personally identifiable information, both individually and combined together, in the following ways:

 

To operate our business and to enhance and personalize your game experience including to:

•    Operate, improve, and develop Moonton’s Service;

•    Populate online leaderboards and enable online matchmaking;

•    Help you find your friends or tell your friends about Moonton’s Service;

•    Facilitate sharing on social networks;

•    Serve and measure the effectiveness of advertising;

•    Measure the health of our services;

•    Set up and maintain accounts you register for;

•    Provide game experiences that you may like;

•    Facilitate your gameplay on multiple devices when available;

•    Identify, fix, and troubleshoot bugs and service errors;

•    Provide software updates;

•    Activate or authenticate your games and save game progress and stats;

•    Adhere to your preferences and to deliver dynamic content; and

•    Help keep our services safe and fair, resolve disputes, investigate and help curb fraud and illegal behavior, comply with the law, and to enforce our agreements and policies.

 

To provide you support, including to:

•    Help identify and troubleshoot problems with your account or games;

•    To survey your opinions through surveys or questionnaires;

•    Communicate with you and respond to your specific requests or questions; and

•    Manage and send you confirmations and important information about your account, products, purchases, subscriptions, and warranties.

 

To personalize our communications with you, including to:

•    Present offers and/or information relating to games you might like;

•    Make recommendations to you; and

•    Personalize advertising for you and deliver targeted marketing, service updates and promotional offers.

 

2.2  Sharing Your Information

Moonton’s users always have a choice whether or not to disclose information. Certain information is required for registration of our services, but most other requested information is optional. It is a top priority at Moonton to make its user feel comfortable and in control.

 

We do not share personal information that directly identifies you (such as your name, e-mail) with independent third parties unless (i) with your prior authorization or consent; (i) if we are required to do so by law, legal process, or a reasonable request from law enforcement authorities or other government officials; (ii) when we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to prevent physical harm or financial loss or in connection with an investigation of suspected or actual illegal activity; or (iii) if necessary to protect the vital interests of Moonton and any of its users (such as to prevent death, bodily harm, or serious damage to property), public security and public interests;

 

We may share anonymous or aggregated information, or other information that does not directly identify you with third parties, as follows:

 

•    Other players and users. Social features are a core component of our games. Other players and users may, for example, see your profile data, in-game activities and read the messages you have posted;

•    Partners working for Moonton. Moonton has partners to perform services for us. These partners process your data only at and according to Moonton’s instructions to provide the Service, such as hosting, player support, advertising, analytics and fraud prevention;

•    Other companies and public authorities. In order to combat fraud and illegal activity, we may exchange data with other companies and organizations and provide it to public authorities in response to lawful requests. We may also disclose your data based on your consent, to comply with the law or to protect the rights, property or safety of us, our players or others;

•    Advertising and Social Media partners. The Service includes features from our partners, such as social media interaction tools and in-game advertising. These partners may access your data and operate under their own privacy policies. We encourage you to check their privacy policies to learn more about their data processing practices;Moonton’s subsidiaries and affiliated entities. To enable or support us in providing Moonton’s Service, we may share users’ information with Moonton’s subsidiaries and affiliated entities. And we also will share information with service providers that perform services on our behalf and under our instructions.

 

2.3  International data transfers

Our Service is global by nature and your data can therefore be transferred to anywhere in the world. Because different countries may have different data protection laws than your own country, we take steps to ensure adequate safeguards are in place to protect your data as explained in this Policy. Adequate safeguards that our partners may use include standard contractual clauses approved by EU Commission and the relevant regulatory authorities of the PRC in case of transfers to the People’s Republic of China.

 

3. Your Rights and Options

You may exercise any of the rights described in this section before Data Controller by sending an email to mobilelegendsgame@gmail.com, and we will respond it to you within 30 days. Please note that we may ask you to verify your identity before taking further action on your request.

 

3.1 Managing Your Information

You may access and update some of your information through your Account settings. If you have chosen to connect your Moonton Account to a third-party application, like Facebook or VK, should you have such requirement, please email to mobilelegendsgame@gmail.com. You are responsible for keeping your information up-to-date. You also have the right to have your information deleted, should you have such requirement, please email to mobilelegendsgame@gmail.com.

 

3.2 Rectification of Inaccurate or Incomplete Information

You have the right to ask us to correct inaccurate or incomplete personal information concerning you.

 

3.3 Information Access.

In some jurisdictions, applicable law may entitle you to request copies of your information held by us. You may also be entitled to request copies of information that you have provided to us in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.

 

3.4 Withdrawing Consent and Restriction of Processing

Where you have provided your consent to the processing of your information by Moonton you can always withdraw your consent at any time, for example by turning off GPS location sharing in your mobile device settings. Please note that the withdrawal of your consent does not affect the lawfulness of any processing activities based on such consent before its withdrawal.

 

Additionally, in some jurisdictions, applicable law may give you the right to object and/or limit the ways in which we use your information, in particular where (i) you contest the accuracy of your information; (ii) the processing is unlawful and you oppose the erasure of your information; (iii) we no longer need your information for the purposes of the processing, but you require the information for the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims; or (iv) you have objected to the processing pursuant to Section 3.6 and pending the verification whether the legitimate grounds of Airbnb override your own.

 

3.5 Cookies and similar technologies

A cookie is a small data file that Moonton transfers to userss computer's hard disk, generally to quickly identify a user's computer and to remember things about the user’s visit, such as the user's preferences or a user's name and password. The Service sends cookies to user's computers when users access or view content of a Moonton game. Information contained in a cookie may be linked to user's personal information for purposes such as improving the quality of our service, tailoring recommendations to user's interests, and making the Service easier to use. Users can disable cookies at any time, although users may not be able to access or use features of the Service.

 

4. How We Protect Personal Information

4.1 Security Safeguards

Security of our users' information is a priority at Moonton, and we are continuously implementing and updating administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your information against unauthorized access, loss, destruction, or alteration. However, please note that no security measure is 100% perfect. This means we cannot guarantee the security of your information and do not assume any responsibility for the unauthorized use or access to your information under our control.

 

If you know or have reason to believe that your Moonton Account credentials have been lost, stolen, misappropriated, or otherwise compromised or in case of any actual or suspected unauthorized use of your Moonton Account, should you have such requirement, please email to mobilelegendsgame@gmail.com, and we will respond it to you within 30 days.

 

Please keep in mind that whenever you voluntarily disclose personal information online through certain channel (for example on message boards, through email, or in chat areas), that information can be collected and used by others. Moonton will take no responsibility whatsoever caused by reasons said above. Since disclosure of personal information through certain channel may lead to disclosure of your personal information, we remind you to use caution before such disclosing. Ultimately, you are solely responsible for maintaining the secrecy of your passwords or any account information. Please be careful and responsible whenever you're online.

 

4.2 Information Retention and Erasure

We generally retain your information for as long as is necessary for the performance of the contract between you and us and to comply with our legal obligations. If you no longer want us to use your information to provide Moonton’s Service to you, you can request that we erase your personal information and close your Moonton Account.

 

Note that if you ask us to remove your personal information, we will retain your information as necessary for our legitimate business interests, such as to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

 

5. Children’s Privacy

Protecting children's privacy online is extremely important to Moonton. We do not direct Moonton’s Service to children under age of 13. We also do not intentionally collect personal information from children through our Moonton’s Service. If you are the parent or guardian of a child and you believe that we have inadvertently received personal information about that child, please contact us as described in the How to Contact Us section of this policy and we will delete the information from our records as quickly as possible. If you believe that we might have any information from or about a child under the age of 13, please contact us.

 

6. Updates to Our Privacy Policy

We may update this policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, law, our operations, or any other reason we determine is necessary or appropriate, so please review it frequently. We will indicate at the top of this policy when this policy was last updated. Please review this policy every time you access or use Moonton’s Service to make sure that you have reviewed the most recent version.

 

7. Links to Other Websites, Games or Applications

The Moonton web site contains links to some other Web sites. Moonton is not responsible for the content or the privacy policy or practices of any other Web sites or for the actions of the companies responsible for those Web sites, please review the privacy policies of those Web sites before providing them with any personal information and publicity of information update. Moonton strongly encourages its users to update and edit their personal information and keep it current.

 

8. Copyright Policy

Moonton respects the intellectual property of others, and we ask our users to do the same. Moonton may, in appropriate circumstances and at its discretion, terminate the accounts of users who infringe the intellectual property rights of others. Moonton owns or has the right to use all the intellectual propriety rights with respect to the content and services that are developed or developed jointly by Moonton. this content and services are protected by applicable intellectual property laws, copyrights, trademarks, service marks, patents or other proprietary rights and laws.

faqs.question: I've received a bill for a purchase I didn't make. What should I do if I suspect fraudulent activity?
faqs.content:
I've received a bill for a purchase I didn't make. What should I do if I suspect fraudulent activity?

2018-07-05 03:50:13  

If you or your child have never played one of our games, but suspect that there's been fraudulent transaction activity on your account, then you should immediately contact Apple (for iOS devices) or Google (for Android devices), who control the transaction process.

For Apple (iOS) devices:

Visit Apple support and select the 'Contact iTunes store support' link, then 'Purchases, billing and redemption' and choose the option that fits you best.

For Google (Android) devices:

Visit Google support and perform a search, or use the 'Contact us' button on the page (English language site only) to reach a Google customer support representative by email or by phone.

If you've already contacted Apple or Google about suspected fraudulent activity and they've sent you to us, please contact us at payment@moonton.com. Be sure to include specific details like what happened and when, transaction ID receipts, relevant screenshots, etc.

faqs.question: My child or I accidentally made an in-app purchase. How do I see about a refund?
faqs.content:
My child or I accidentally made an in-app purchase. How do I see about a refund?

2018-06-04 08:36:15  

As with most downloadable software products, items bought through our games (in-app purchases) are generally non-refundable. In some special occasions there can be exceptions, However, there are some exceptions. Please take notice of following guidelines before submitting a refund request.

  1. Refund requests must be made within 7 days of original purchase.
  2. Refund requests will be denied if diamonds were used to purchase any in-game products, such as heroes or skins or chests.
  3. Google Play refunds for purchases made on Android devices are possible through our customer service.

For Apple (iOS) devices:

Visit Apple support (https://support.apple.com/itunes) and select the 'Contact iTunes store support' link, then 'Purchases, billing and redemption' and choose the option that fits you best.

For Google (Android) devices:

Please send your payment concerns to payment@moonton.com or reach out to the customer platform in game. Make sure to mention when you made the original purchase and provide proof of purchase. Also, please provide us with your order number (e.g. GPA.1234-1234-1234-12345). Proof of purchase must be clear and unaltered. To find your proof of purchase, please check your app store account’s email address or in your app store’s purchase history. Google Play users please click: https://payments.google.com/payments/home#oneTimePurchase

 

NOTICE:

In order to preserve the fairness of the game, once your refund request is successful, our system will automatically deduct the diamonds acquired from the refunded purchase. If you’ve already purchased in-game products, and do not have sufficient diamonds, your diamond balance will be negative. At the same time, all the heroes you own and all game modes will be blocked until you recharge your account with diamonds to return your diamond balance back to normal. If you are refunding the Starlight Membership, we will remove the exclusive skins, avatar borders, and any other Starlight privileges from your account. Players who make frequent refund requests will be flagged as refund abuse, we reserve the right to delete these players' accounts.
